summary: Implements a demonstration of mini-batch training for a heterogeneous graph attention network using random-walk neighbor sampling. It defines the model architecture, a sampling utility for constructing training blocks, and utilities for evaluation and early stopping within a PyTorch/DGL workflow.
business_intent: Showcase how to efficiently train heterogeneous graph neural networks on large-scale data by leveraging random-walk based neighbor sampling, enabling scalable node classification with attention mechanisms.
